com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.panels

Class AdapterPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.panels.AdapterPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AdapterPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Creates and stores every component needed to display emulation of adapter including SensorPanels, AdapterDetailsPanel, Logger, etc. needed to show and switch between displayed representation of adapters.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      AdapterPanel(DetailedSimulation sim, int i, java.lang.String host, java.lang.String ip, int port, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String protocol)
      Creates new panel for showing SensorPanels, creates and initializes adapter's Logger, ServerPanel, AdapterDetailsPanel and Adapter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdapterPanel

        public AdapterPanel(DetailedSimulation sim,
            int i,
            java.lang.String host,
            java.lang.String ip,
            int port,
            java.lang.String id,
            java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String protocol)
        Creates new panel for showing SensorPanels, creates and initializes adapter's Logger, ServerPanel, AdapterDetailsPanel and Adapter.
        Parameters:
        sim - simulation creating new adapter panel, not null
        i - number of new adapter panel, not null
        host - server hostname, null id ip is not null
        ip - server ip, null if host is not null
        port - server port
        id - new adapter's id
        name - new adapter's name
        protocol - communication protocol version
